name: U.F.O. Unidentifed Flying Obliterator
description:
Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 with the theme "Let there be Chaos" Pilot a UFO and absorb as much of the city as possible! Don't let the army helicopters shoot you down!

Font used: Pixeled by OmegaPC777

Stuff made before the Jam: The city destruction system and sound effect is originally from a different project I am working on. It's a similar type of game, so I already knew how to make a lot of the mechanics. Footage for comparison.
